name: pirate_ship_game
description:
Game for interview.

Simple topdown shooter of pirate ships.

Move: 

W or UpArrow -- Move Forward 

A  / D  or LeftArrow / RightArrow -- Rotate Clock/Anticlockwise

Shoot:  SPACE

Kill the most enemies before the time runs out or you're destroyed!

Unity 2021.3.3f1

Github: https://github.com/danielcardosot17/pirate_game

Any questions feel free to ask!
